channel.title: A Little Suggestion
channel.description:
Well, I'm quite sure you are aware of the current troubles that we have had/having/going to have, in my little 13 year old Yz85Racer eyes, I believe a lot of it is cause by the operators. (The Channel Operators(ops)) Well, I for one believe it's time to try something new. This is a little proposal, but, what if the users of moparisthebest were to have a "vote" on who should have operator privileges...
And with that, I believe we should have a seperate category on the forum about IRC. Yes, I know maybe you agree with the saying "What happens on IRC, stays on IRC." Well, true. But a separate board would be a place were users could post conversations, report stupidity by users, report an abusing operator.
Anyway, back to the vote. Ofcourse, moparisthebest would recieve operator and all the standard people, but people like Stork (Stork this doesn't mean offence, I think you do a great job as OP but you're the first person who comes to mind).. People who aren't staff etc..
Regards, #38.
